title: Add full menu page with categorized sections

requirements.summary: Create a Menu page component with categorized sections displaying menu items in card layout with images, names, descriptions, and prices
acceptanceCriteria: Menu page component exists with categorized sections
Each category has a clear heading and displays multiple menu items
Menu items show name, description, price, and image
Layout uses the existing gold/charcoal luxury theme
Page is responsive and maintains design consistency with Gallery and Home pages

file_operations.description: Create Menu page component displaying categorized menu sections (Appetizers, Main Course, Beverages, Desserts). Include hero section with heading. Display menu items in card layout with images from frontend/public/assets/generated/ (appetizer-platter.dim_800x600.png, chicken-tikka.dim_800x600.png, dal-makhani.dim_800x600.png, biryani.dim_800x600.png, grilled-fish.dim_800x600.png, chocolate-lava-cake.dim_800x600.png, fruit-platter.dim_800x600.png, signature-mocktail.dim_800x600.png, lime-soda.dim_800x600.png), names, descriptions, and prices. Use Playfair Display for headings, Inter for body text, and gold/charcoal color scheme with hover effects consistent with MenuHighlights component styling.

requirements.summary: Add routing for Menu page using TanStack Router following existing Gallery route pattern
acceptanceCriteria: Menu route is defined in App.tsx
Menu page is accessible via /menu path

file_operations.description: Add /menu route to TanStack Router configuration following the same pattern as the existing Gallery route. Import Menu component and register it with the router to make it accessible at /menu path.

requirements.summary: Update Header navigation to include Menu link between Home and Gallery
acceptanceCriteria: Menu link appears in both desktop and mobile navigation
Link shows active state styling when on Menu page
Navigation order is Home → Menu → Gallery

file_operations.description: Add Menu navigation link between Home and Gallery links in both desktop and mobile navigation. Apply active state styling using the same pattern as existing links. Ensure navigation order is Home → Menu → Gallery.

requirements.summary: Add Menu link to Footer quick links section
acceptanceCriteria: Menu link is added to Footer quick links section
Link navigates to the Menu page when clicked

file_operations.description: Add Menu link to the quick links section of the Footer component. Use the same link component and styling as the existing Gallery link to maintain consistency.

requirements.summary: Wire generated menu item images as static assets for all menu categories
acceptanceCriteria: Menu item images are rendered from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images are displayed for all menu items across categories
Image quality and styling are consistent with existing food images

file_operations.description: Reference the generated menu item images using exact workspace paths: frontend/public/assets/generated/appetizer-platter.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/chicken-tikka.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/dal-makhani.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/biryani.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/grilled-fish.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/chocolate-lava-cake.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/fruit-platter.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/signature-mocktail.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/lime-soda.dim_800x600.png. Apply consistent image styling with hover effects matching existing food images in MenuHighlights.
